snippets.what_detail: COVID-19 is the new respiratory disease spreading around the world and it is caused by a coronavirus.
snippets.protection_detail: There is currently no vaccine to prevent coronavirus disease 2009 (COVID-19).
snippets.sick: What to do if you are sick
snippets.sick_detail: A guide to help you make decisions and seek appropriate medical care.
snippets.care_detail: Monitor the person for worsening symptoms, know the emergency warning signs.
